data.title: Xeraco Airfield
data.meta_description: Xeraco Airfield is a small airport in València, Valencia, Spain. The airport is located at latitude 39.02581 and longitude -0.20751. The airport has one runway: 9/27.
data.text:
Xeraco Airfield is a small airport in València, Valencia, Spain. The airport is located at latitude 39.02581 and longitude -0.20751. The airport has one runway: 9/27. This airport has no ICAO code, we use ES-0200 as reference. Nearby other airfields are Benicolet Airfield, Riola Agro Airstrip, Aeroclub Gregal, Albalat de la Ribera Airstrip and Alcalá de la Jovada Airstrip.

Xeraco Airfield does not publish a METAR, the nearest weather station is Valencia Airport, which is 57 km away. The flight information region (FIR) is Barcelona.

Xeraco Airfield is in the timezone of Europe/Madrid. Difference with UTC is +2 h. Today the sun rises at 07:09 and sets at 21:03. This applies to Xeraco Airfield, the universal daylight period may be different. The difference between the local time and UTC is +2 hour. Daylight saving time is currently in progress.

Things to do at this airport

Go to Vliegles.nl to find flying lessons, skydives and other flying experiences. Browse the page for all available activities near Xeraco Airfield. You can also use the search function to find specific flying lessons, skydives or other flying experiences near your place.
